section.45: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Apostle (ï·º) as saying:Let him be humbled into dust; let him be humbled into dust. It was said: Allah's Messenger, who is he? He said: He who sees either of his parents during their old age or he sees both of them, but he does not enter Paradise
